thread.title: BRIEF-Alan Townsend Announces Plan To Retire As President And CEO Of Rosehill Resources

title: BRIEF-Alan Townsend Announces Plan To Retire As President And CEO Of Rosehill Resources
text:
May 2, 2018 / 8:33 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Alan Townsend Announces Plan To Retire As President And CEO Of Rosehill Resources Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 2 (Reuters) - Rosehill Resources Inc:
* ALAN TOWNSEND ANNOUNCES PLAN TO RETIRE AS PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF ROSEHILL RESOURCES INC.
* TOWNSEND ALSO INDICATED HIS INTENTION TO STEP DOWN FROM HIS POSITION AS A DIRECTOR OF COMPANY
* ROSEHILL IS CONDUCTING A SEARCH TO IDENTIFY A PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER CANDIDATE TO SERVE AS TOWNSENDâ€™S SUCCESSOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
